      • GetHeaderOnline

        public CrmAuthenticationHeader GetHeaderOnline(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String url)
                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                               org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                               javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                               javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException,
                                               ServiceFaultException
        Gets a CRM Online SOAP header & expiration.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of a valid CRM user.
        password - Password of a valid CRM user.
        url - The Url of the CRM Online organization (https://org.crm.dynamics.com).).
        Returns:
        CrmAuthenticationHeader An object containing the SOAP header and expiration date/time of the header.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        ServiceFaultException

                                      java.lang.String keyIdentifer,
                                      java.lang.String token1,
                                      java.lang.String token2)
        Gets a CRM Online SOAP header.
        Parameters:
        url - The Url of the CRM Online organization (https://org.crm.dynamics.com).
        keyIdentifer - The KeyIdentifier from the initial request.
        token1 - The first token from the initial request.
        token2 - The second token from the initial request..
        Returns:
        String The XML SOAP header to be used in future requests.

        public CrmAuthenticationHeader GetHeaderOnPremise(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password,
                                         java.lang.String url)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets a CRM On Premise SOAP header & expiration.
        Parameters:
        username - Username of a valid CRM user.
        password - Password of a valid CRM user.
        url - The Url of the CRM On Premise (IFD) organization (https://org.domain.com).

      • CreateSoapHeaderOnPremise

        public java.lang.String CreateSoapHeaderOnPremise(java.lang.String url,
                                         java.lang.String keyIdentifer,
                                         java.lang.String token1,
                                         java.lang.String token2,
                                         java.lang.String issuerNameX509,
                                         java.lang.String serialNumberX509,
                                         java.lang.String signatureValue,
                                         java.lang.String digestValue,
                                         java.lang.String created,
                                         java.lang.String expires)
        Gets a CRM On Premise (IFD) SOAP header.
        Parameters:
        url - The Url of the CRM On Premise (IFD) organization (https://org.domain.com).
        keyIdentifer - The KeyIdentifier from the initial request.
        token1 - The first token from the initial request.
        token2 - The second token from the initial request.
        issuerNameX509 - The certificate issuer.
        serialNumberX509 - The certificate serial number.
        signatureValue - The hashsed value of the header signature.
        digestValue - The hashed value of the header timestamp.
        created - The header created date/time..
        expires - The header expiration date/tim.
        Returns:
        String SOAP Header XML.
